description: Notice of permitted development of telecommunications apparatus comprising: Proposed upgrade to the existing 15.0m high Carl C SRr230 climbable lattice tower. Telecommunications apparatus. Proposed EE 1no. gps node at 15.70m to be installed. Proposed EE 3no's. mha units. Proposed EE 3no's. rru's i to be installed within new airo cabinet. Proposed ee 1no. airo cabinet to be installed. ee 1no. huawei bts 3900a cabinet on concrete foundation to be removed. EE 6no's. mha units to be removed. Existing mafi freestander to be removed. EE 2no's. bob units at 1.50m to be removed. EE 3no's. rru's at 1.50m to be removed and associated ancillary works.
site_name: Truck BustersUnit 8 Burnett RoadDarent Industrial ParkErithKentDA8 2LG
